title: POS - Prime Minister
subtitle: Which countries has he given money to? Are you sure it wasn’t taxpayers money as part of an organised aid program? I don’t believe in capital punishment but expect Morrison & Dutton will be in gaol one day when an inquiry into their neglect of refugees is finalised at The Hague. pic.twitter.com/5fScqCNeEg

title: bill/sparow
subtitle:
2019 Nov, 179 Medivac refugees arrived in Australia, NOT 1 is in Hospital today

More then 90% Never went to Hospital

And They Are all still in Australia?

More than 50 of these have been rejected by the US as “unfit”?

Anthony Albanese: The Medivac Bill is working as intended pic.twitter.com/a6dti5J0ID

title: Oxfam Australia
subtitle:
There are a record number of refugees worldwide - 29.5 million people.

title: Nicole Tooby
subtitle: The #US helped #Australia out by resettling some refugees, but that does not let Australia off the hook.
